name: Damage Control!
description:
This was made for the #Remakejam.

how to install the installer:

1. download and run the exe file and follow the instructions on the installer

how to install the zip:

1. unzip all files and launch the exe

_______________________________________________________________

how to play:

WASD to move, left click to shoot water.
